text: Trying to Get Arrested is a 1909 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithTRYING TO GET ARRESTEDRichard Schickel. D.W. Griffith: An American Life and stars John R. Cumpson, Anita Hendrie, and Florence Lawrence. ==Actors== *John R. Cumpson as the tramp *Anita Hendrie as the assaulted woman *Florence Lawrence as a nanny *Charles Inslee as the policeman *Owen Moore as passerby *Herbert Prior as tough guy *Mack Sennett as tough guy *Arthur V. Johnson as fugitive ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 movies Category:1900s comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Trying to Get Arrested
